about:
squibit! serves as an employee communications platform regarding safety, security, and ethics issues in and out of the workplace.

Follow the instructions to submit a detailed report regarding your concern, which can always be anonymously completed and sent to the appropriate person(s) at your company. The more detailed, relevant info you can provide in your report will lead to the most effective response, so please take the time to complete as many questions as possible.

This app is not meant to enable miscellaneous (think of a better word) ‘narking’ or ‘tattle-tailing’, but to help improve your Workplace Neighborhood by providing an easy to use platform to share insightful observations individuals observe throughout the day.
privacy:
Arbor Insight, LLC operates squibit! (the “App”). This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use and disclosure of Personal Information we receive from users of the App.

We use your Personal Information only for providing and improving the App. By using the App, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

Information Collection And Use

While using our App, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to, your name, email address, or phone number (“Personal Information”).

Cookies

Cookies are files with small amounts of data, which may include an anonymous unique identifier (“squibit ID”). Cookies are sent to your browser from a web site and stored on your computer’s hard drive.

Like many sites, we use “cookies” to collect information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our App.

Security

The security of your Personal Information is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

Changes To This Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy is effective as of 7/20/16 and will remain in effect except with respect to any changes in its provisions in the future, any of which will then be in effect immediately after being published to this page.

We reserve the right to update or change our Privacy Policy at any time and you should check this Privacy Policy periodically. Your continued use of the App after we publish any modifications to the Privacy Policy on this page will constitute your acknowledgement of the modifications and your consent to abide and be bound by the modified Privacy Policy.

If we make any material changes to this Privacy Policy, we will notify you either through the email address you have provided us, or by placing a prominent notice on our platforms.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: privacy@arborinsight.com
